```{r}
library(pdftools)
library(magick)

## convert pdf's to png's
setwd(here::here("dev"))
pdfs <- list.files(here::here("dev"), pattern = "*.pdf")

for(pdf in pdfs) {
  pdf_convert(pdf = here::here("dev", pdf), 
              format = "png", dpi = 150)
}

system("magick.exe convert *.png -resize 1233x900 -gravity center -background white -extent 1233x900 out-%03d.png")

## convert png's to gif
system("magick.exe -delay 15 out*.png -delay 500 out-232.png -loop 0 dev_2020_28_CoffeeRatings.gif")
```
